instruction: kind of make a bark sound, and then carefully go backward a tiny bit, and then please veer right a bit, then um go forward for a while
um rotate left a tiny bit, then make a bark sound
kind of rotate right about-face, after that please go forward some distance, next go backward a little.
First, move ahead a little. Then, veer right about a quarter turn.
First, go backward a lot. Then, rotate right a lot.
